description:
Jose has fallen into the crevasse because of the eruption of the ice volcano and Midge goes off to save him, but the two are trapped in the freezing cold by a resulting snowstorm. The frogs also suddenly show up on the icy planet in the midst of the chaos of the snowstorm. When the snowstorm finally subsides, the frogs go after Ellen and the others who have left the Stork to rescue Midge and Jose who are stranded in the extreme cold and ice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Crevasse Distress SOS! / Snowy Mountain Panic!
Crevasse Sounan SOS! / Yukiyama Dai Panic!
クレバス遭難SOS! / 雪山大パニック!
